name: Wild Wagons
description:
Wild Wagons is a wild-west themed puzzle game where you have to add wagons onto waiting trains. But not all wagons should be put next to each other - will you beat the high score? Get ready for a wild ride with Wild Wagons

We fixed the game crashing bug, but because we are not able to upload the fix anymore, here is a link where you can download the fix otherwise: https://shared-assets.adobe.com/link/08d1fad8-b4f2-4713-64dc-357f46ebb53a  (if this is not working: https://cloud.moritz-butenob.de/s/ZkGYBee6W2q6zF6)
But we wanna make clear this fix was made at 21:10!

If you want to find out more about the game and its mechanics, here is a link to our git-repository: https://github.com/alineary/gmtk2021
